nodes.text: The Unnipar system was a Wild Space star system. At some point between 0 BBY and 3 ABY, Archduke Monio of the Outer Rim Territories' Dentamma Nebula bet the ownership of the entire Unnipar system in a high-stakes sabacc game. The Teltior con artist Ceezva, who had bluffed her way into the game, managed to win the system from Monio.

The Unnipar system was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Three, written by John Terra. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system within grid square H-19.
